title: Can't connect to games

replies.body:
It can definitely be frustrating trying to troubleshoot what's causing that issue, but it sounds like you're taking some good steps in trying to fix the problem! A few of those ideas I recognized from our [connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) guide, which is also worth going through if there are a few steps you missed.

If you're still not seeing a difference with your connection after going over that guide, hit us up with a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Tech team can take a closer look at the situation.

Don't give up yet, it looks like you're on the right track to finding the cause and solution!
